on reading compounds: 竹馬【タケウマ】stilts (for walking), hobby horse
kun reading compounds: 竹【たけ】bamboo (any grass of subfamily Bambusoideae), middle (of a three-tier ranking system)
竹馬【たけうま】stilts (for walking), hobby horse
笛竹【ふえたけ】bamboo flute, bamboo for making flutes, wind and string instruments
苦竹【にがたけ】Japanese timber bamboo (Phyllostachys bambsoides), giant timber bamboo, madake, Simon bamboo (Pleioblastus simonii)
